com.shop.cache.api.storage
Interface SCStorage

public interface SCStorage

interface for storage instances

removeGroup

java.util.List<java.lang.String> removeGroup(SCGroup group)
                                             throws java.io.IOException
sccache supports associative keys via SCGroup. This method deletes all objects associated with the given group.

Parameters:
group - the group to delete
Returns:
list of keys deleted.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - errors

sccache supports associative keys via SCGroup. This method lists all keys associated with the given group.
